category.label: MultiSelect
category.selector: body > div:nth-child(6) > form > table > tbody > tr:nth-child(2) > td:nth-child(2) > select

severity.label: MultiSelect
severity.selector: body > div:nth-child(6) > form > table > tbody > tr:nth-child(4) > td:nth-child(2) > select

priority.label: Radio
priority.selector: body > div:nth-child(6) > form > table > tbody > tr:nth-child(5) > td:nth-child(2) > select

summary.label: TextArea
summary.selector: body > div:nth-child(6) > form > table > tbody > tr:nth-child(9) > td:nth-child(2) > input[type="text"]
